大学院入学試験: (だいがくいんにゅうがくしけん) - graduate school entrance examination
大学院入試: (だいがくいんにゅうし) - graduate school entrance examination
大学院受験: (だいがくいんじゅけん) - (act of) taking a graduate school entrance examination
大学院理学研究科: (だいがくいんりがくけんきゅうか) - graduate school of sciences
大学院生: (だいがくいんせい) - graduate student
大学院進学: (だいがくいんしんがく) - continuing one's education into graduate school
大學: (だいがく) - post-secondary education institution, incl. university, college, etc.; former central university of Kyoto (established under the ritsuryo system for the training of government administrators); the Great Learning - one of the Four Books
大宇宙: (だいうちゅう) - macrocosmos; macrocosm; the universe; the cosmos
大安: (だいあん) - lucky day; auspicious day
大安吉日: (たいあんきちにち) - (yoji) very auspicious day for all types of occasions (one of the six special days in the Japanese lunisolar calendar)
大安売り: (おおやすうり) - special bargain sale
大宗教: (だいしゅうきょう) - major religion; great religion
大宝: (だいほう) - great treasure; Taihou era (701.3.21-704.5.10)/Daihou era; great treasure (used to refer to bodhisattvas, esoteric teachings, etc.); homa-mandala (fire altar)
大宝律令: (たいほうりつりょう) - Taiho Code (701 CE)
大宮: (おおみや) - imperial palace/shrine; Grand Empress Dowager/Empress Dowager; woman of imperial lineage who has borne a child; elderly woman of imperial lineage
大宮司: (だいぐうじ) - high priest of a great shrine
大宮御所: (おおみやごしょ) - Empress Dowager's palace
大宰: (おおみこともち) - government official working for the daizaifu
大宰府: (dazaifu) - dazaifu (sob o sistema ritsuryō, escritório governamental com jurisdição sobre Kyushu, Iki e Tsushima)
大家族: (だいかぞく) - extended family; large family
大家族主義: (だいかぞくしゅぎ) - {bus} big family principle; extended family policy
大容量データストレージ: (だいようりょうデータストレージ) - high capacity data storage
大容量記憶システム: (だいようりょうきおくシステム) - MSS; Mass Storage System
大容量記憶装置: (だいようりょうきおくそうち) - mass storage
大寄: (おおよせ) - calling many harlots and entertainers and have a big party; starting an important maneuver at the end of a game of go
大寄せ茶会: (おおよせちゃかい) - formal tea gathering; formal tea party
大富豪: (だいふごう) - multi-millionaire/extremely rich person; Japanese card game
大寒: (だいかん) - (time of) extreme cold; "major cold" solar term (approx. Jan 20, roughly the coldest time of the year)
大寒小寒: (おおさむこさむ) - first verse of a nursery rhyme sung by children on cold days (similar to "It's Raining, It's Pouring")
大審院: (だいしんいん) - Supreme Court (until 1947); Great Court of Cassation
大寿林: (オオジュリン) - reed bunting (Emberiza schoeniclus)
大将: (だいしょう) - general/admiral; boss/leader/local kingpin; (familiar or jocular term for addressing a male) old chap/mate/boss/chief/man; athlete who competes in the last match of a team competition (kendo, judo, etc.)
大将軍: (たいしょうぐん) - commander-in-chief; one of the eight gods of the koyomi
大尉: (taii) - captain (Exército, Corpo de Fuzileiros Navais dos EUA, Força Aérea dos EUA), lieutenant (Navy), flight lieutenant (RAF, RAAF, RNZAF, etc.)
大小: (だいしょう) - sizes (various)/large and small; daisho (matched pair of long and short swords); large and small drums; long months and short months
大小便: (だいしょうべん) - feces and urine
大小前: (だいしょうまえ) - (located in front of the 大鼓 and 小鼓 players)  upstage center (in a noh play)
大小順序: (だいしょうじゅんじょ) - collating sequence
大尺鷸: (ダイシャクシギ) - Eurasian curlew (Numenius arquata)
大尽: (だいじん) - (occ. written 大臣) rich person/millionaire/magnate; big spender/debauchee
大尽振舞: (だいじんぶるまい) - (yoji) royal treatment; entertain someone extravagantly
大局: (たいきょく) - general situation; the whole point
大局将棋: (たいきょくしょうぎ) - Taikyoku shogi (variant of shogi)
大局的: (たいきょくてき) - in perspective; big-picture
大層: (たいそう) - very much; exaggerated; very fine
大山木: (タイサンボク) - evergreen magnolia; Southern magnolia; Magnolia grandiflora
大山椒魚: (オオサンショウウオ) - Japanese giant salamander (Andrias japonicus)
大山鳴動: (たいざんめいどう) - (yoji) big fuss over nothing; much cry and little wool; much ado about nothing
大山鳴動してねずみ一匹: (たいざんめいどうしてねずみいっぴき) - much ado about nothing; The mountains have brought forth a mouse (Aesop)
大山鳴動して鼠一匹: (たいざんめいどうしてねずみいっぴき) - much ado about nothing; The mountains have brought forth a mouse (Aesop)
大岡裁き: (おおおかさばき) - judicial decision made with human kindness and warmth in a fair manner (from the decisions of Oooka Tadasuke, a jurist in 17th century Japan)
大島桜: (オオシマザクラ) - Oshima cherry (Prunus speciosa)
大島紬: (おおしまつむぎ) - Oshima tsumugi weave; type of pongee from Oshima
大己貴神: (おおあなむちのかみ) - Okuninushi; deity of magic and medicine later viewed as equivalent to Daikokuten and celebrated at Izumo Grand Shrine
大巴旦: (オオバタン) - Moluccan cockatoo (Cacatua moluccensis); salmon-crested cockatoo
大帝: (たいてい) - great emperor; .. the Great
大師: (だいし) - great teacher (i.e. a buddha, bodhisattva or high monk, esp. Kobo Daishi)
大師堂: (だいしどう) - hall with an enshrined statue of Kobo Daishi (at a Shingon temple)
大師範: (だいしはん) - master; grandmaster; senior instructor
大幅: (oohaba) - big, large, drastic, substantial; full-width cloth (aprox. 72 cm de largura para roupas tradicionais japonesas; aprox. 140 cm de largura para roupas ocidentais)
大幅刷新: (おおはばさっしん) - widescale reform
大幅削減: (おおはばさくげん) - sharp reduction; drastic cut
大幣: (おおぬさ) - streamers (made of linen, paper, etc.) attached to a long pole (used as a wand in grand purification ceremonies); being in great demand
大年: (おおどし) - New Year's Eve/December 31st; Jupiter (planet)
大年増: (おおどしま) - woman well past her prime; matron well-advanced in age
大年神: (おおとしのかみ) - guardian deity of grain farming; guardian deity of the rice harvest
大広間: (おおひろま) - banquet or reception hall
大店法: (だいてんほう) - Large-scale Retail Stores Law
大廈高楼: (たいかこうろう) - (yoji) large building and lofty tower; splendid (magnificent, palatial) structure
大建築: (だいけんちく) - edifice; monumental architecture; huge building
大引け: (おおびけ) - closing (a market or trading session); closing price
大弯: (たいわん) - greater curvature of stomach; curvatura ventriculi major
大弱り: (おおよわり) - extremely troubled; very puzzled
